title: kaDal pOlavE
sahitya:
kaDal pOlavE karuNai uDaiya vaDivElan aDi paNivOrellAm kaDaitEri viDuvArE


anupallavi

  paDi mEl tannaDiyAr paDum tunbamellAm uDanE tuDaittiDum uLLam paDaittavan


caraNam    arum tavam purindu perum varam peravE garva mighap-pirandu dharma neri turandu
tirinda assUranum tirundiyE tannuDan pirindiDadirundu sirandiDa sheidavan
